about_the_game:
Game Introduction

The Realm of Insight Compass is a turn-based tactical chess game. With a 9x9 rotating game board and a unique terrain system, the game offers a more strategic experience. Rotating the game board is the key to victory in battles. By strategically rotating the board, you can change the terrain, alter movement paths, and reposition enemies to gain the best strategic advantage. The game truly embodies the concept of "a small move can affect the whole situation."

Game Features

Unique board rotation mechanism that combines board rotation with terrain. Board rotation is the core gameplay element, allowing you to rotate the board to solve crises, eliminate enemies, rescue allies, collect energy orbs, and more.

Combination of board rotation and terrain construction, creating more possibilities and strategic depth.

The demo version includes 4 playable characters, each with unique skills.
